--- revoke_role.sql
REVOKE ROLE pii_access, pii_writter FROM ROLE hr_manager, hr_director

--- AST
&ast.Revoke{
  Revoke:        0,
  FromRoleNames: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 46,
      NameEnd: 56,
      Name:    "hr_manager",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 58,
      NameEnd: 69,
      Name:    "hr_director",
    },
  },
  RevokeRoleNames: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 12,
      NameEnd: 22,
      Name:    "pii_access",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 24,
      NameEnd: 35,
      Name:    "pii_writter",
    },
  },
  Privileges: []*ast.Privilege(nil),
  TableNames: []*ast.Ident(nil),
}

--- SQL
REVOKE ROLE pii_access, pii_writter FROM ROLE hr_manager, hr_director
